archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.3.13c: c) conducting a review of the entire security event management process before closing the incident, so that any lessons learnt can be applied to improve security event management.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
